section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Solum is involved in the recycling of nutrients and production of renewable energy based on organic surplus. 
 
Solum treats waste, builds biogas & composting plants and sells soil mixes and growing media based on compost.
